name: TodayInJewishHistory
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
R' Yakov Emden writes that the greatest miracle ever in world history was not the splitting of the sea. Not the 10 plagues. Not even Mt. Sinai. Rather, its the fact that there is still a Jewish people today. This flash briefing is brought to you by Rabbi Pinchas Landis of Partners In Torah of Cleveland (www.TorahCleveland.com). The short daily segments will give you a snapshot of what happened on this date throughout Jewish history. Appreciate the greatest miracle ever on a daily basis.

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
